TextView.android:text:
Cashair allows any user to register himself/herself with CashAir and use his/her account to send CAIRS to another registered account securely. 


->> On Registraion Page: 
 Enter your correct details to register with Us. 
 Post registration a unique 6 digit Pin No. will be generated for your account that will be used for transactions. 


->> On Login Page: 
 Enter your correct Username and Password to view your Profile page. 


->> On Profile Page: 
 This is your profile page. 
 To make a transaction click on Pay button. 
 To view your transactions click on View Transactions. 
 To edit your profile click on Edit Profile. 
 To signout click on Sign Out. 


->> On View Transactions Page: 
 This page displays the list of all the transactions you have made till date. 


->> On Edit Profile Page: 
 You can change your password, update your Phone no. and Email ID. 


->> On Pay Page: 
 Enter correct Pin No. of the receiver and valid amount to pay, to generate a unique 8 digit TransactionID. 
 This unique 8 digit TransactionID will be received on the Receiver's Phone no. via SMS. 


->> On TransactionID Page: 
 Enter the correct, unique 8 digit TransactionID received on the Receiver's phone via SMS to complete the transaction.
